-- Direction to move: -- 0 means no move into this direction -- 1 means to the right/bottom -- -1 means to the left/up updown = 0 leftright = 0
function funccU() updown = -1 leftright = 0 end
function funccR() leftright = 1 updown = 0 end
function funccD() updown = 1 leftright = 0 end
function funccL() leftright = -1 updown = 0 end
function funccReset() fill_floor("fl-water", akt_pos_x, akt_pos_y, 5,5)
-- Reset the current position: akt_pos_x = initial_pos_x akt_pos_y = initial_pos_y
-- And the directions: updown = 0 leftright = 0

function timer_callback()
-- To prevent the boat from leaving the level: if akt_pos_x +5 < levelw-10 and akt_pos_x > 10 and akt_pos_y +5 < levelh-6 and akt_pos_y > 6 then
-- Clear the old position: fill_floor("fl-water", akt_pos_x, akt_pos_y,5,5)
-- Move the boat, calculate the new position: akt_pos_x = akt_pos_x + leftright akt_pos_y = akt_pos_y + updown
-- Draw it: fill_floor("fl-hay", akt_pos_x, akt_pos_y,5,5) end
-- Draw the initial pos too: fill_floor("fl-hay", initial_pos_x, initial_pos_y,5,5) end
